MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Dickson Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:03PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11PM on 15th April 2021
